cruelty_definition.description: Whether the act falls under explanation (a) or (b) of the section.

husband_or_relative_of_husband.description: The person committing the cruelty (husband or relative).

intention_to_drive_suicide_or_injury.description: Cruelty that drives the woman to suicide or causes grave injury/danger to life/health.

location_of_cruelty.description: Where the acts of cruelty occurred (e.g., 'matrimonial home', 'parental home').

nature_of_cruelty.description: Specifics of the physical or mental cruelty inflicted.

demand_for_property.description: The property or valuable security for which demand was made.

date_of_complaint.description: The date the complaint was filed.

case_title.description: The full case title with parties (e.g., 'A.K. Goel vs. State of Delhi').

court_name.description: The name of the court that delivered the judgment (e.g., 'High Court of Delhi').

judgment_date.description: The date the judgment was delivered (e.g., '15th March, 2012').

appellant_or_petitioner.description: The name(s) of the appellant or petitioner.

judges_coram.description: The name(s) of the judge(s) who delivered the judgment.

sections_invoked.description: List of legal sections invoked in the case.

case_type.description: The type of case (e.g., 'Criminal Appeal', 'Writ Petition').

acts_and_sections.description: Acts and sections involved in the case.
